manual.manifest: The path manifest for the deployment. (see: https://specs.arweave.dev/#/view/lXLd0OPwo-dJLB_Amz5jgIeDhiOkjXuM3-r0H_aiNj0)
manual.ant: The tx ID of the ARNS ANT. (see: https://ar.io/arns-pilot/)
manual.app: If set, his is where the index file will point. This could be docs, a readme, anything.  Point it to an entire react app using it's manifest id.  You can use https://<your-ant>.arweave.dev/manifest to access the manifest of this package.
manual.pack: Tells the cli whether or not to run npm pack in the ./dist folder.  You can also pass --pack to the cli to specify a directory to pack.
manual.readme: The txid of the readme file (could be anything, a video, docs, etc.).  This will show at (https://<your-ant>.arweave.dev/readme)
